CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT (Coverage_Code_Type__c ) , 'Complementary Cov Code', Billing_Product__r.Complementary_Coverage_Code__c , 'Dental Cov Code', Billing_Product__r.Dental_Coverage_Code__c , 'Drug Cov Code', Billing_Product__r.Drug_Coverage_Code__c , 'Med Cov Code', Billing_Product__r.Med_Coverage_Code__c , 'Vision Cov Code', Billing_Product__r.Vision_Coverage_Code__c , 'Data Issue' )
CustomField.label: Cov Code
